name: Employee Benefits Management, Inc.
description: Developer of an employee benefits management platform intended for perks providers to reach audiences and increase sales. The company's SaaS-enabled platform helps businesses create a streamlined employee experience to maximize HR investments and drive core business results, empowering businesses to better employee experiences.
